website_summaries.verdict: Unique triangular shape tip allows for easy blending.
pros: Waterproof formula stays on in even hot, humid conditions
cons: Tends to cling to dry patches of skin

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this foundation quite a bit but the tube itself is small (1 oz is the standard size for most foundations -- this is about 2/3 of an ounce). To me it felt a little greasy, though, and not full coverage. To use it in a way to achieve full coverage you would have to use more - and because this product is so expensive, I was wary to do so. Delightful formula and shade range though. If price is no object definitely pick one up.
customer_reviews.author: FedHoo

customer_reviews.title: Covers Acne Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad acne rosacea and this is the only thing that covers it. I never leave the house without it on, it's worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.author: Don Juan

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging but great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this foundation I use it all the time however the first time I opened it the stick was broken off in the lid. I was able to knock it out and get some use from it but a lot of it will wasted as it’s still stuck in the cap. Great product but this really ruins it.
customer_reviews.author: TX Girl MGL

customer_reviews.title: I love my Hourglass Vanish stick
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE my Hourglass Vanish Stick.. full coverage for myself but if not, it can definitely be built up... definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stillion

customer_reviews.title: Can come broke.
customer_reviews.text: I waited patiently for this to arrive couldn’t wait... and when it did I opened the box carefully, opened my product swiveling it up and it was broke in half landing on my floor. It came to me broke cause the box wasn’t damaged. I gave it 1 star for the box coming to me un damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Graves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. Covers well and performs as expected
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Family

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage I don’t even use my foundation anymore and a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best concealer on the market
customer_reviews.text: While expensive, this is the BEST foundation and coverage stick you will find. I have used this concealer stick as a foundation for years now. I used it all over my face. It is light and not too heavy, but provides full coverage for acne, dark spots, and discoloration. Hourglass products are amazing.... I even used their foundation sometimes. But this stick is all I need on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Reel Estate

customer_reviews.title: Nice foundation
customer_reviews.text: The product it's self is fine. I would not purchase from this seller as the container and product stick were broken when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel of the product
customer_reviews.text: I do wish that it had a little more coverage, i.e. lasted longer. I like the feel of the product, the color, etc., I just hate having to reapply before going out in the evening
customer_reviews.author: highonlife

customer_reviews.title: Think before purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you know what color you need and have had prior experience with this item, don’t bother buying!! You don’t like it and your out $40 because they won’t refund you your money back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Very good coverage. I don't care for the delivery system (stick). The stick sometimes breaks off or gets stuck in the tube. I have to dig it out and put it in an empty compact. Would really like it if the stick formula was available in a compact rather than a tube.
customer_reviews.author: Jo D.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It came smushed into the top but besides that it’s okay, very heavy not full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I Love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting, easy to apply and touch up. It is a full coverage foundation stick and does not dry out the skin
customer_reviews.author: Oana Murray

customer_reviews.title: Not good for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews for this product and should have listened to them. I have oily/ dry combination skin. Mostly dry well this foundation stuck to my dry areas even after applying moisturizer and a primer (matifying) and it made my skin so oily it was a disaster. Really disappointed since it was so expensive! Coverage I give 4 stars other than that did not work out
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: It was melted
customer_reviews.text: It came melted all over the Box. Wasn't able to use the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stick foundation
customer_reviews.text: The shade was spot on, which was mostly the aspect I was worried about getting wrong since it'd be an expensive mistake. I found my shade by looking it up on sephora because the amazon shades look way off, and by looking up shades on youtube. I do think the shades on amazon look darker than they actually are. The foundation blends in flawlessly with the skin, the only thing I would say that it's more medium-coverage than full-coverage. I really like the foundation itself, and the triangle shape, it's better than most stick foundations. The package came in nicely packaged and the product wasn't damaged in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Ter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Close to full coverage and blends out well with a beauty blender for me.
customer_reviews.author: Haley *'=_

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Great, long lasting coverage! A little bit goes a LONG way! I dab all over and use the Hourglass foundation brush to blend. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 50 years old and I have used everything from drugstore foundations to $100 department store foundations. This is by far the best. It’s light but yet has great coverage. It doesn’t settle in my fine lines like other foundations.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I really like the coverage and the fact the foundation is on ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the coverage and the fact the foundation is on a stick. I'm so tired of wasted foundation that doesn't all come out of jars or squeeze tubes. I had trouble with the customer service when my product was delivered damaged but they made up for it by immediately sending a replacement and provided an apology. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JOF

customer_reviews.title: I love this make up
customer_reviews.text: I love this make up, a bit pricey and maybe a little heavy for some people but I don't wear it every day though I could. Works great and I have never had one I like for years and years. Either too greasy, too many reapplications, but not his one. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine but it’s no better than the drugstore brand I was looking to replace
customer_reviews.author: Courtney.kempe

customer_reviews.title: Favorite foundation!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite foundation! It makes my face babydoll like. Smooth as can be. Worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight foundation
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice for a lightweight foundation but I was hoping for all day wear
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT MY FACE NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: The way it goes on so smooth and looks so natural. Color is what I expected as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the better ones out there, and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Page V. Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect, in love with this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I just have to say: it is perfect, in love with this foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Oriana

customer_reviews.title: “Cake”
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t like it. Very hard to match skin shade. Made my skin look “orange”
customer_reviews.author: Hannavas

customer_reviews.title: Melted and broken when received
customer_reviews.text: The stick was broken and smashed into the cap when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I’ve gotten the best sleep in my life
customer_reviews.text: I never get good sleep. But I always look like it when I use this. Not to mention it feels like coloring on your face with a crayon. 14/10
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Bertschi

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It goes on very thick and not spreadable. Does not do well with wrinkles. Coverage does not last and becomes spotty. Basically a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AndiLand

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible foundation. Worst I’ve ever had. I ordered it directly from hourglass and their returns are only accepted within 45 days but I didn’t realize that and I didn’t even use it for the first time until after that. So I’m stuck with it. Idk why people told me to buy it or why people like it because it was the worst foundation I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Taner

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just got mines and I opened the box to see it looked used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chalky
customer_reviews.text: I was so hoping this "full coverage" stick would work to cover my sun spots. I tried it on two different days, one with primer and moisturizers and one with just moisterizer. Both days ended up looking chalky. Also, before you pick a color, go to the hourglass site and see the choices there. I did it after I ordered and was sorry. It did give me fuller coverage, but still didn't cover the sun spots. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: truly seamless coverage
customer_reviews.text: I never ever wear foundation but tried "golden" to cover three red zits on chin and it worked like magic!!! "Beige" is another shade that looks natural on my pale olive skin. Hourglass makes exceptional makeup but too many chemicals = minus 1
customer_reviews.author: krispy_enterprises

product_meta.title: Hourglass Vanish Seamless Finish Foundation Stick (PORCELAIN)
product_meta.description: A revolutionary foundation stick with the coverage of a concealer, the fluidity of a liquid, and the weightlessness of a powder in a longwearing waterproof formula for undetectable full coverage. The unprecedented concentration of pigment in this foundation provides maximum coverage with minimum product, concealing all discoloration and imperfections for virtually perfect skin with a seamless finish.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
